title: A Complete Astrological Portrait of Kanye West

steps.title: Sun: Gemini
steps.content: Sun: Gemini A person’s Sun sign highlights their personality, soul, and identity; basically, everything that makes them who they are. [1] X Research source Gemini Suns are characterized by their adaptability, flexibility, and tendency to change. [2] X Research source Such themes are common for West, both in his career and his personal life. In the 2000s, West played a big role in changing the status quo of the hip-hop music genre. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Moon: Pisces
steps.content: Moon: Pisces A person’s Moon sign relates to the more private aspects of their personality: how they process their emotions, how they react to things, and what their instincts are. [4] X Research source Pisces Moons are known for their sensitivity and insightfulness, as well as their tendency to dream big and have their head in the clouds. [5] X Research source This seriously tracks, given the fact that West himself has identified as a “Highly Sensitive Person” (a person deeply affected by stimuli and other people’s emotions). [6] X Research source

steps.title: Rising/Ascendant: Cancer
steps.content: Rising/Ascendant: Cancer A person’s Rising sign (or Ascendant) speaks to the initial impression they leave on others. A Cancer Rising, in particular, is known for the aura of care and compassion they give off toward others. [7] X Research source Cancer Risings are also known for being go-getters who are ruled by their feelings—a phenomenon that West can definitely relate with.

steps.title: Mercury: Taurus
steps.content: Mercury: Taurus A person’s Mercury sign relates to themes like communication, teaching, and studying. People with their Mercury in Taurus tend to be really knowledgable in their fields of interest and take a lot of pleasure in learning new things. [8] X Research source It’s hard to deny the wealth of knowledge West has in terms of the hip-hop genre, especially when considering all of the profound themes covered in his music.

steps.title: Venus: Taurus
steps.content: Venus: Taurus In astrology, a person’s Venus sign relates to the way they experience and share love, as well as their material tastes. [9] X Research source Venus in Taurus individuals are known for being dedicated and loyal lovers, and for appreciating the sensual aspects of life (things that appeal to the five senses). [10] X Research source West’s 6-year-long marriage to Kim Kardashian (and their family of 4 kids) is a testament to his sense of dedication and devotion, even if their partnership ultimately didn’t work out.

steps.title: Mars: Taurus
steps.content: Mars: Taurus An individual’s Mars sign refers to their sense of initiative and drive, and ultimately speaks to a person’s wants and willpower. A Mars in Taurus placement is very realistic and patient and lives according to their own beliefs and vision (rather than society’s). [11] X Research source West’s ongoing career is a good example of his self-motivation and drive. Even after his controversial statements of late 2022, West continues to make and release music.

steps.title: Jupiter: Gemini
steps.content: Jupiter: Gemini A person’s Jupiter sign speaks to a person’s personal growth and sense of ethics, and how they develop over time. A Jupiter in Gemini like West is known for having plenty of irons on the fire, and for gaining expertise in multiple aspects of their life. [12] X Research source West has participated in many different pursuits and business ventures over the years, from restaurants and music streaming to brand partnerships and politics.

steps.title: Saturn: Leo
steps.content: Saturn: Leo Saturn is the planet of maturity, and is a firm teacher that shows how we need to improve. Saturn in Leo teaches humility and focuses on finding a healthy, confident state of being that doesn’t border on arrogance. [13] X Research source West received a classic Saturn-esque lesson after his publicized insult to Taylor Swift at the 2009 VMAs. He received backlash for his comments, including criticism from then-President Barack Obama. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Uranus: Scorpio
steps.content: Uranus: Scorpio Uranus represents themes of awakening in astrology, as well as the change that comes with them. Uranus in Scorpio, in particular, can be a destructive sign that seeks reinvention—in other words, people with this placement will drastically change themselves if they no longer vibe with their old personality. [15] X Research source West arguably made some destructive changes to himself in 2022 when he posted hateful comments that ultimately destroyed his public image.

steps.title: Neptune: Sagittarius
steps.content: Neptune: Sagittarius In astrology, Neptune represents abstract themes like spirituality and dreams. [16] X Research source People with Neptune in Sagittarius tend to be extra free-spirited individuals who are comfortable saying what they want—they don’t care about what anyone else thinks! [17] X Research source West definitely embodies this free-spirited energy, especially when you consider the number of comments he’s received backlash for.

steps.title: Pluto: Libra
steps.content: Pluto: Libra In astrology, the planet Pluto symbolizes transformation and destruction, often making waves in people’s lives with the change it brings. [18] X Research source Pluto in Libra specifically desires change through peace, harmony, and open-mindedness rather than conflict. [19] X Research source While West’s recent statements and beliefs definitely don’t give off Pluto in Libra vibes, the way he’s handled his personal life has shown him cooperatively responding to change. For example, West accepted sharing custody of his kids with Kim Kardashian following their divorce. [20] X Research source

steps.title: North Node & South Node: Libra
steps.content: North Node & South Node: Libra & AriesAccording to professional astrologer Angel Eyedealism, your “ north node is [everything] that you’re capable of achieving in this life,” and your south node is “old bad habits that are always there waiting for you,” like your “default setting.” People with a Libra North Node are striving to learn more about cooperation and diplomacy, while fighting the more selfish and impulsive desires of Aries South Node. [21] X Research source West’s life and career are frequently defined by moments of impulsivity where cooperation and restraint could’ve come in handy.

steps.title: Chiron: Taurus
steps.content: Chiron: Taurus Minor planet Chiron represents the painful lesson a person learns in their life—through this lesson, they learn how to help others. People with Chiron in Taurus struggle with challenges like developing their own beliefs and overindulging but are great at providing a calm and grounded space for others. [22] X Research source In 2002, West was in a deadly car accident after falling asleep on the road. Through this potentially fatal experience, he got inspired to create the song “Through the Wire,” which helped launch him into the music scene.

steps.title: Lilith: Gemini
steps.content: Lilith: Gemini Black Moon Lilith is a point in space rather than a physical planet. In astrology, Lilith revolves around the themes a person is connected to in their lifetime, and their desire to either embrace or run away from them. People with their Lilith in Gemini are surrounded by themes of communication and self-discovery and aren’t inclined to take life seriously. [23] X Research source West’s recent career is filled with instances where he should’ve put more thought and care into his words and actions.

steps.title: West has mostly water and earth signs in his chart.
steps.content: West has mostly water and earth signs in his chart. Each zodiac sign is categorized into 1 of the 4 elements: fire, earth, air, and water. When all of West’s different signs are tallied up from his birth chart, earth and water come out on top. [24] X Research source Water sign representation points to traits like being sensitive and emotional, which are relevant themes throughout West’s life and career as a musician. Earth signs are known for their stability, which can be seen in the consistent success West found, especially early on in his career.

steps.title: West has mostly fixed and mutable signs in his chart.
steps.content: West has mostly fixed and mutable signs in his chart. The 12 zodiac signs are divided into 3 modalities, or core traits: cardinal, fixed, and mutable. Cardinal signs begin each season and are known for being initiators; fixed signs fall in the middle of a season and are known for being stable and trustworthy; and mutable signs come at the end of a season and are known for being adaptable and wise. [25] X Research source You can see the presence of fixed signs in the early success of West’s career. The adaptability of mutable signs is apparent in the recent changes and transitions West has made in his life.

steps.title: West cycles through the 12 Houses starting with Cancer.
steps.content: West cycles through the 12 Houses starting with Cancer. Astrology Houses are 12 equal-sized portions (or slices of a pie) that make up your circular birth chart. Each House rules over a specific aspect of one’s life, and each House is ruled and influenced by a specific sign. [26] X Research source Here’s a breakdown of what his Houses look like: 1st House : Cancer 2nd House : Leo 3rd House: Virgo 4th House : Libra 5th House : Scorpio 6th House : Sagittarius 7th House : Capricorn 8th House : Aquarius 9th House : Pisces 10th House : Aries 11th House : Taurus 12th House : Gemini

steps.title: There is a T-square in West’s chart.
steps.content: There is a T-square in West’s chart. A T-square is an aspect pattern that revolves around themes of achievement and progress, and the difficulties that one must overcome to reach success. The strength and power of this aspect of this aspect depend on the planet at the very top of the triangle. [27] X Research source West’s T-square is formed from Jupiter, the Moon, Neptune, and the Sun, which are considered “weak” planets. People with T-squares that are fueled by weak planets have trouble performing at their best, which can definitely be seen in the past few years of West’s career.

steps.title: West’s Life Path number is 11.
steps.content: West’s Life Path number is 11 . People with this Life Path Number are often viewed as trailblazers who carve their own path in life and avoid sticking to the status quo. They’re also great at working with others. [28] X Research source West is well-known for the trailblazing impact he had in the music industry, especially in the earlier years of his career. He’s also known for his collaborations with artists like Jay-Z, T-Pain, and Lupe Fiasco.

steps.title: West’s Chinese astrology animal is the Snake.
steps.content: West’s Chinese astrology animal is the Snake. In the Chinese zodiac, the Snake is well-known for being decisive. [29] X Research source This is a trait that West can resonate with, for better or for worse.

steps.title: Sun Square Moon
steps.content: Sun Square Moon The Sun and Moon are at a right angle from one another in West’s chart, creating a “square.” [30] X Research source The emotional elements of the Moon conflict with the individualistic elements of the Sun, which can lead to issues with friends and loved ones. [31] X Research source Such conflict can be seen in the breakdown of West’s marriage to Kardashian in 2020.

steps.title: Sun Conjunction Jupiter
steps.content: Sun Conjunction Jupiter A conjunction refers to two planets existing under the same sign—in West’s case, both his Sun and Jupiter signs both fall under Gemini. [32] X Research source Having this aspect in his chart points to material success, which is definitely true for West. [33] X Research source

steps.title: Sun Sextile Saturn
steps.content: Sun Sextile Saturn The Sun is sextile (60 degrees away) from Saturn. This alignment highlights personality traits like responsibility, as well as low self-esteem. [34] X Research source

steps.title: Sun Opposition Neptune
steps.content: Sun Opposition Neptune The Sun is 180 degrees away from Neptune on West’s birth chart—in other words, they’re on completely opposite sides. This placement can point to a person being too compassionate or sacrificing themselves too much for others. [35] X Research source

steps.title: Sun Trine Pluto
steps.content: Sun Trine Pluto The Sun is trine (120 degrees apart) with Pluto, which is a positive aspect. [36] X Research source It points to West being very strong-willed and determined to reach his achievements.

steps.title: Focus on the individual aspects and build from there.
steps.content: Focus on the individual aspects and build from there. Natal charts can look pretty intimidating at a glance, but they’re really just the sum of their parts—the key is learning exactly what those parts are. Luckily, wikiHow makes birth charts easy to decode with guides like: What Planets Mean & How They Affect Us What Aspects Mean & How They Affect Us What Houses Mean & How They Affect Us
